name: textarea
description: Input field for textareas that is best suited for larger amounts of text.

fields.data:
Textarea field properties:
⦿help - explain input pattern and purpose. can be displayed on ❔ button click
⦿default - value on initial display
⦿readonly - prevent input to be editable
⦿required - when set to ture, input must be provided (empty string is not allowed) 
⦿restrictions - provide maxCharCount value to limit the number of chars for the TextArea.
⦿placeholder - Disappears on user input

fields.name: textarea_field_json
fields.default:
{
  "display": "Regex Example",
  "default": "Click the help button to reveal field's pattern",
  "help": "Regex Example input should start with 'Textarea-1' followed by one letter",
  "name": "textarea_regex",
  "required": true,
  "type": "textarea",
  "validation": "^Textarea-1[A-Za-z]+"
},
{
  "display": "Not Required Example",
  "default": "You don't have to fill me",
  "help": "Not Required Example is not a mandatory field, hence, it can be sumbited empty",
  "name": "textarea_not_required",
  "type": "textarea"
},
{
  "display": "Readonly Example",
  "default": "Some fixed input",
  "help": "Readonly Example is a disabled, presetted field",
  "name": "textarea_readonly",
  "readonly": true,
  "type": "textarea"
},
{
  "display": "MaxCharCount Example",
  "default": "Some input with maxCharCount 300",
  "help": "MaxCharCount Example input should not exceed 300 chars",
  "name": "textarea_maxCharCount",
  "maxCharCount": 300,
  "type": "textarea"
},
{
  "display": "Placeholder Example",
  "help": "Placeholder Example has placeholder field",
  "name": "textarea_placeholder",
  "placeholder": "this placeholder will disappear on user input",
  "type": "textarea"
}
